| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( ( ph /\ K e. Ring ) -> ( ( Unit ` K ) = ( ( Base ` K ) \ { ( 0g ` K ) } ) <-> ( Unit ` L ) = ( ( Base ` L ) \ { ( 0g ` L ) } ) ) ) |
